title: Messenger
description: Darkness falls on the Great Lands. Gabriella knows the days of unity are over and urges her father to heed the warnings. But King Algor refuses to listen, believing he can unite the kingdoms. Once the Great Prince descends on their castle, he scatters all resistance, imprisons her sister, and forces Gabriella on the run.For years, Gabriella dreams of retribution. When a messenger tracks her in the forest, she fears all is lost. But the messenger arrives with a mission â€“ for Gabriella to challenge the Prince. Armed only with powerful instincts and a gift for premonition, Gabriella sets out on the perilous journey to end his reign of terror.
author: K.M. Tremills
